txt.en: 'Sharkû...'
'Saruman...'
Talk to Flam Helur
'He is fine. He knows not to try anything!'
'But more importantly...'
'Oh!'
'What a pity.'
Follow Flam Helur to the Uruk he and his partner captured
'I hope he is stronger than you proved to be!'
Flam Helur has agreed to lead you and Meneldir to the Uruk he and his partner captured.
Drusi Begwyl stands guard over her captive, and wants to ask you something.
'It's not far now... just a quick jog up the hill.\n\n'Sorry about the chill in the air, friends! But we're almost there.'
Drusi's captive sneers at you.
Flam Helur, one of the Stoor hunters of Clegur, has agreed to bring you to the Uruk he and his partner Drusi captured.

'Did you see those boars? They ran right past here, and I would have loosed some arrows at them but I did not want to take my attention off the captive!

'They were big, though! There'd have been meat enough on those bones to prepare quite a few boar-meat steaks for the folk of Clegur. Tell me that you saw them, and that Flam was quick enough with his bow or his knife to get them!'

You assure Drusi that the boar-meat can be brought back to the village when you are done here... but perhaps there are more pressing matters at hand?

'More pressing?' she asks. 'I suppose, but still: those boars really were something, and it would be a shame to let so many potential dinners escape without at least trying!'
DNT - Blah!
Meneldir stands ready to fight whatever new danger approaches.
'When I get free of these rats, I'll make you pay! You'll wish you never crossed Ushdul!\n\n'You have no idea what's coming for you, for all of you!'
The wounded Uruk stirs
'I think these newcomers must be here to rescue our captive, [placeholder].\n\n'Let us show them they have erred, and badly! We will not let him go without a fight!'
You have prevented the rescue of Ushdul by the Uruks.
Ushdul is dying, pierced by arrows fired by his supposed rescuers.

'This changes... nothing! You will die... even more painfully than I!'

Ushdul visibly gathers his strength, hatred flaring in his eyes.

'Hear me, all of you! Hear the words of Ushdul!'
Prevent Ushdul from being rescued by the Uruks
Ushdul lies dying. He has demanded you listen to his final words.
Flam Helur has fallen, and you have failed!
'Saruman? Why would he speak the name of the White Wizard?\n\n'What did he mean by that?'
Return to the captive Uruk and remain on your guard
Talk to the dying Ushdul
Hear Ushdul's dying words
Meneldir and the Stoors seek to learn what has brought Ushdul and the other Uruks to Swanfleet.
Meneldir has fallen, and you have failed!
'Drusi, maintain your vigil! Flam, [placeholder], to me!'
'They were not here to rescue him at all.'
'You are supposed to be bringing us to your captive, Flam.'
'Why did you come to Swanfleet?'
'I think you will find you are wrong about that, creature.'
'The fighting Uruk-hai go where they please!'
'Wait... something approaches.'
'Nowhere is safe for you!'
'Ready yourselves, friends!'
'Is that so?'
'This is an Uruk arrow.'
'My boys have their orders, but once that's done...'
'He dies by the deeds of his own kind.'
'I think they'll want to stay.'
'Sharkû? This is your leader?'
'There's good eating to be had in this valley.'
'I am not frightened of your kind, Ushdul.'
'Plenty of... vermin.'
'I thought you'd never hear them.'
'Come get me, boys!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Both Meneldir and Flam Helur must survive</rgb>
Talk to Drusi Begwyl
'This way! Follow me, and no dawdling!'
'Wait.'
Talk to the captive Uruk
'Do you hear that?'
'What good fortune! Boar-steaks will serve us well for the winter!'
Ushdul breathes his last. He is dead
Remain alert and learn what brought Ushdul and the Uruks to Swanfleet
'Oh yes, oh yes.'
Flam Helur has fallen, and you have failed!
Talk to Meneldir
'This way.'
'Drusi! How fares the captive?'
<rgb=#FF0000>Both Meneldir and Flam Helur must survive</rgb>
'How dare you!'
'Oh my. I think our captive is dying.'
Instance: Mark of the White Hand
'You will die at the hands of the Uruk-hai.'
'Sharkû has made us a mighty force.'
